languages.text: "Дай им образование, чтобы они выросли полезными для корабля. Назначь учителей, выдели книги и поощряй подарками лучших".

traits.locale_text: "Дадим сиротам образование, чтобы в будущем они были полезнее для корабля и могли претендовать на хорошие должности. Назначь учителей, выдели книги и поощряй подарками лучших учеников".

languages.text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
languages.original_text: "Дай им образование, чтобы они выросли полезными для корабля. Назначь учителей, выдели книги и поощряй подарками лучших".

traits.locale_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
"Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
"Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
"Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

"Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
"Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

languages.text: « Instruisez-les de manière à ce qu'ils puissent se rendre utiles à bord une fois adultes. Affectez-leur des professeurs, fournissez-leur des livres et veillez à ce que les meilleurs élèves soient récompensés. »
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

traits.locale_text: « Instruisez-les de manière à ce qu'ils puissent se rendre utiles à bord une fois adultes. Affectez-leur des professeurs, fournissez-leur des livres et veillez à ce que les meilleurs élèves soient récompensés. »

languages.text: «Instrúyalos para que puedan ser de más ayuda para la nave. Asígneles profesores, libros de suministros y que los mejores estudiantes sean recompensados con regalos».
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

traits.locale_text: «Instrúyalos para que puedan ser de más ayuda para la nave. Asígneles profesores, libros de suministros y que los mejores estudiantes sean recompensados con regalos».

languages.text: 「成長した彼らが船に貢献できるように教育してくれ。教師を任命し、本を与え、優秀な生徒には贈り物をして褒めてやるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らが成長して船により貢献できるように教育しなさい。教師を任命し、本を与え、優秀な生徒には贈り物で表彰しなさい」

languages.text: “为那些孩子提供教育，让他们长大之后能发挥更大作用。给他们找老师来，准备好教科书，为最优秀的学生提供礼物和表彰。”
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

traits.locale_text: “为那些孩子提供教育，让他们长大之后能发挥更大作用。给他们找老师来，准备好教科书，为最优秀的学生提供礼物和表彰。”

languages.text: "Erzieht sie, damit sie eines Tages einen größeren Nutzen für das Schiff haben. Setzt Lehrer ein, verteilt Bücher und belohnt die besten Schüler mit Geschenken."
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."

traits.locale_text: "Erzieht sie, damit sie eines Tages einen größeren Nutzen für das Schiff haben. Setzt Lehrer ein, verteilt Bücher und belohnt die besten Schüler mit Geschenken."

languages.text: "Onları eğit. Böylece büyüdüklerinde gemiye daha fazla katkı sağlayabilirler. Öğretmenler görevlendir, kitap dağıt ve en iyi öğrencileri takdir etmek için hediye ver."
languages.original_text: "Educate them so that they may grow up to be of greater use to the ship. Assign teachers, supply books, and commend the best students with gifts."
